title: I don't know my email for my account and no longer have password
body: It's been a little while since I've played but I'm getting a new computer soon and I'm trying to get my account I have my username but nothing else can I send in a support ticket or what should I do?

replies.body: Our account team might be able to help with this through your ticket.  They'll work with you towards regaining access to your account, and try to have your ready for your new computer.  I don't have access to your ticket, but please let me know if you have any questions!

Yes, please head over to the Player Support page and submit an Account Recovery [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you're able to provide enough information on your account they should be able to help you out.
Thank you do you know how long it takes to respond?

It depends on the current ticket backlog; could take less than a day, could take about three. Make sure you provide as much accurate information as you can the first time around, because the ticket will be placed in the back of the queue if you need to bump it with another reply, but be patient because they will definitely get to it as soon as they can.
